item.Q:
Write the character:
a register; a block of printing; an edition; version; page
item.A:
版 (strokes unavailable)
bǎn
人民出版社 rénmínchūbǎnshè Peoples Publishing House

item.Q:
Write the character:
regard as; to figure; to calculate; to compute
item.A:
算 (strokes unavailable)
suàn
计算 (計算) jìsuàn to count; to calculate; to compute

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: head
2: suff. for nouns
item.A:
traditional: 頭
1: tóu 2: tou
头脑 (頭腦) tóunǎo brains; mind 石头 (石頭) shítou stone

item.Q:
Write the character:
to be fond of; to like; to enjoy; to be happy; to feel pleased; happiness; delight; glad
item.A:
xǐ
喜欢 (喜歡) xǐhuan to like; to be fond of

item.Q:
Write the character:
to allow; to permit; to praise; somewhat; perhaps; surname
item.A:
traditional: 許
xǔ
许多 (許多) xǔduō many; a lot of; much

item.Q:
Write the character:
light; ray; bright; only; merely
item.A:
guāng
光线 (光線) guāngxiàn optical line; optical cable; light ray

item.Q:
Write the character:
today; modern; present; current; this; now
item.A:
jīn
今天 jīntiān today; at the present; now

traditional: 買
mǎi
购买 (購買) gòumǎi purchase

dì
兄弟 xiōngdì brothers; brethren

item.Q:
Write the character:
to seem; like; as; if
item.A:
若 (strokes unavailable)
ruò
若是 ruòshì if

item.Q:
Write the character:
to gather; to unite; to unify; whole
item.A:
traditional: 統
tǒng
统一 (統一) tǒngyī to unify; to unite; to integrate

item.Q:
Write the character:
body; torso; person; life; status; pregnancy; (a measure word used for clothes) suit
item.A:
shēn
本身 běnshēn itself; in itself; per se

item.Q:
Write the character:
to remember; to note; mark; sign; to record
item.A:
traditional: 記
jì
记者 (記者) jìzhě reporter; journalist

item.Q:
Write the character:
substitute; to replace; generation; dynasty; age; period; (historical or geological) era
item.A:
dài
代表 dàibiǎo representative; delegate; to represent; to stand for

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: day of a month; (suffix used after) name of a ship; (ordinal) number
2: roar; cry
item.A:
traditional: 號
1: hào 2: háo
信号 (信號) xìnhào signal 国号 (國號) guóháo title of current dynasty (as the name of China), such as Tang or Ming; name of a country (such as People's Republic of China 中華人民共和國|中华人民共和国 or Republic of China 中華民國|中华民国)

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to reside; to live; to dwell; to be in; to stay; get along with; to be in a position of; deal with
2: a place; location; spot; point; (classifier for locations or items of damage); office; department; bureau; respect
item.A:
traditional: 處
1: chǔ 2: chù
处理 (處理) chǔlǐ to handle; to treat; to deal with; to process 到处 (到處) dàochù in all places; everywhere

item.Q:
Write the character:
to finish; to be over; whole; complete; entire
item.A:
wán
完全 wánquán complete; whole; totally; entirely

item.Q:
Write the character:
to receive; to answer (the phone); to meet or welcome sb; to connect; to catch; to join; to extend; to take one's turn on duty; take over for sb
item.A:
jiē
直接 zhíjiē direct (opposite of indirect); immediate; directly; straightforward

item.Q:
Write the character:
to calculate; to compute; to count; reckon; ruse; to plan; surname
item.A:
traditional: 計
jì
计划 (計劃) jìhuà plan; project; program; to plan; to map out

item.Q:
Write the character:
to speak; to say; talk; word

yán

traditional: 號
roar; cry
国号 (國號) guóháo title of current dynasty (as the name of China), such as Tang or Ming; name of a country (such as People's Republic of China 中華人民共和國|中华人民共和国 or Republic of China 中華民國|中华民国)

到处 (到處) dàochù in all places; everywhere

item.Q:

item.A:
to finish; to be over; whole; complete; entire
完全 wánquán complete; whole; totally; entirely

item.Q:

(zhíjiē de jiē)
item.A:
to receive; to answer (the phone); to meet or welcome sb; to connect; to catch; to join; to extend; to take one's turn on duty; take over for sb
直接 zhíjiē direct (opposite of indirect); immediate; directly; straightforward

item.A:

to calculate; to compute; to count; reckon; ruse; to plan; surname Ji

语言 (語言) yǔyán (spoken) language

traditional: 許多
xǔduō many; a lot of; much
dàibiǎo representative; delegate; to represent; to stand for
wánquán complete; whole; totally; entirely

traditional: 計算
jìsuàn to count; to calculate; to compute
wánchéng complete; accomplish; perfect tense (grammar)

traditional: 統一
tǒngyī to unify; to unite; to integrate
jīntiān today; at the present; now

traditional: 處理
chǔlǐ to handle; to treat; to deal with; to process

traditional: 系統
xìtǒng system
jīnnián this year
běnshēn itself; in itself; per se

traditional: 身體
shēntǐ (human) body; health

traditional: 時代
shídài age; era; epoch; period

traditional: 信號
xìnhào signal
yǒusuǒ somewhat; to some extent
shuǐfèn moisture content
gōngshì formula

traditional: 及時
jíshí in time; promptly; without delay; timely
ránér however; yet; but
wénzhāng article; essay
